MS.S: Provides cmdlets to allow Azure DevOps:_x000A__x0009__x0009_- Analyse a Blueprint for Resource Groups, Parameters and Secure Parameters that require values_x000A__x0009__x0009_- Analyse a Blueprint for Resource Groups, Parameters and Secure Parameters that do not require values_x000A__x0009__x0009_- Create Azure DevOps Variable Groups and Variables for Resource Groups, Parameters and Secure Parameters found in a Blueprint_x000A__x0009__x0009_- Match Blueprint Resource Groups, Parameters and Secure Parameters with Azure DevOps Variables When Assigning a Blueprint in a Pipeline_x000A__x0009__x0009_- Removes Blueprint Assignment

Provides cmdlets to allow Azure DevOps:_x000A__x0009__x0009_- Analyse a Blueprint for Resource Groups, Parameters and Secure Parameters that require values_x000A__x0009__x0009_- Analyse a Blueprint for Resource Groups, Parameters and Secure Parameters that do not require values_x000A__x0009__x0009_- Create Azure DevOps Variable Groups and Variables for Resource Groups, Parameters and Secure Parameters found in a Blueprint_x000A__x0009__x0009_- Match Blueprint Resource Groups, Parameters and Secure Parameters with Azure DevOps Variables When Assigning a Blueprint in a Pipeline_x000A__x0009__x0009_- Removes Blueprint Assignment
